Module FYPManager
Package controllers

Class FacultyRequestManager

java.lang.Object
controllers.FacultyRequestManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IFacultyRequestManager
public class FacultyRequestManager extends Object implements IFacultyRequestManager
This class is the manager for the faculty requests. It implements the IFacultyRequestManager interface.
